definitions.body: Nebuchadrezzar, Nebuchadnezzar (Bab. Nabû-kudurri-uṣur = (prob.) Nebo, protect the boundary ! Dl:Calwer BL Budge:Nebuchadn. (on kudurru, boundary, v. Dl:HWB 319); poss. is also crown, and so Schr:COT 2Ki 24:1; Jäger:BAS i. 471 prop. (thy) servant);—LXX Nabouxodonos(s)or; Can. Ptol. Nabokolassarou Schr:COT 490, Abydenos etc. Naboukodro/sorov, v. Schr:ib. 2Ki 24:1; —the great king of Babylon (reigned B. C. 605–562), who captured Jerus. and carried Judah captive: most oft.
